descriptions: Optimized Icons: Refactored the icon library to reduce file size and improve UI rendering speed.
Added Lazy Loading: Implemented lazy loading for lists and media to significantly decrease initial load times and memory usage.
Mugshot Optimization: Enhanced the processing of suspect photos to ensure smooth scrolling and browsing of records.
Added 'Has Scroll' Functionality: Integrated visual scroll indicators to improve navigation and user experience within long documents and lists.
Change files to update: Download the latest version from your portal and replace all files.
